prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and vibrant red accents.
I want a bird-like Pokemon that embodies the spirit of freedom and agility.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a small, energetic swallow with striking colors.
Make a unique design for a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a lively personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can soar high in the sky with graceful wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Design a playful, small bird Pokemon that loves to flutter around in grassy areas.
Give me a concept for a Pokemon that represents the beauty of nature and the sky.
